name: Boom Headshot - Justin Vo
description:
BOOM HEADSHOT! 

In Boom Headshot, the only button you need is the space bar which controls when the sniper fires.

TIPS AND TRICKS:

The sniper will always shoot the target closest the bottom of the screen.

There is a one second cooldown on the sniper. It's indicated in the bottom left of the screen.

Your score only increases on headshot kills.

You only have one life! So sometimes going for headshots isn't the right move if there is a big swarm coming at you at once.

Side notes:

The sound effects/music, fonts, and the background image are not mine!
